items.reviewContent:
I'm satisfied with the product and it is a nice purchase. had some scratches in the fridge and on edge of the inside glass door. pic not attached. 
This is the official Dawlance Pakistan store.
2 Buttons behind to control the cold and hot water. (should introduce light switch)
The Water taps, hot and cold water taps work great. If you don't use the warm/cold water tape too much then the warm water tap will be a little bit chill.
They are magnetic in both doors to close them. Rubber around the fridge.
The Fridge temp around 12-18C and normally i see 15-17C (in November while hardly using the water tap n opening the fridge door)
This Water Dispenser isn't for those who want chilled drinks, ice cream, etc, and don't want to buy a room fridge.  It will be normal cold after a few hours but not chilled. Maybe the same for other dispensers.
The compressor doesn't run regularly if the water is not depleted much. Good feature to save electricity and its life.
items.itemTitle: Dawlance Water Dispenser WD 1051 With Refrigerator Glass Door CE Qualified
